page.title: 11TRANSPORT 2
page.content: {ROADS AND BUS SERVICES. Crosville Motor Services operate the E69 bus service, providing 2 return trips to Altrincham per week - TUES.& SAT. mornings- stopping at Mobberley station and Smith Lane. A school bus takes children to and from Knutsford High School picking up at Church Lane, Hobcroft Lane and Broad Oak Lane. There are 8 miles of minor roads + untarred roads in the area. Distance from nearby Motorways M56 - 7.5 miles, M6 - 9.5 miles. {MANCHESTER AIRPORT. Manchester Internation Airport is 8 miles away by road, but the runway itself is very close. 80% of Aircraft taking off fly SW into the prevailing wind directly over Mobberley. Total departures in 1985 estimated at 48350. 20% of arrivals fly in low over area.
